mapper.select: select id, employee_id, employee_name, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_problem_category, education_problem_detail, education_check_result, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degreee_judgment, education_remark, education_have_problem,update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.education_info where id = #{id}

select id, employee_id, employee_name, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_problem_category, education_problem_detail, education_check_result, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degreee_judgment, education_remark,education_have_problem, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.education_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select id, employee_id, employee_name, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_problem_category, education_problem_detail, education_check_result, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degreee_judgment, education_remark,education_have_problem, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.education_info
mapper.insert: insert into archivesmanagementsystem.education_info(employee_id, employee_name, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_problem_category, education_problem_detail, education_check_result, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degreee_judgment, education_remark, education_have_problem,update_by, update_time) values (#{employeeId}, #{employeeName}, #{educationDegree}, #{educationBackgroud}, #{educationProblemCategory}, #{educationProblemDetail}, #{educationCheckResult}, #{educationBackgroudJudgment}, #{educationDegreeeJudgment}, #{educationRemark}, #{educationHaveProblem},#{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update archivesmanagementsystem.education_info
employee_id = #{employeeId},
employee_name = #{employeeName},
education_degree = #{educationDegree},
education_backgroud = #{educationBackgroud},
education_problem_category = #{educationProblemCategory},
education_problem_detail = #{educationProblemDetail},
education_check_result = #{educationCheckResult},
education_backgroud_judgment = #{educationBackgroudJudgment},
education_degreee_judgment = #{educationDegreeeJudgment},
education_remark = #{educationRemark},
education_have_problem = #{educationHaveProblem},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from archivesmanagementsystem.education_info where employee_id = #{employeeId} and employee_name=#{employeeName}

select id, employee_id, employee_name, education_degree, education_backgroud, education_problem_category, education_problem_detail, education_check_result, education_backgroud_judgment, education_degreee_judgment, education_remark,education_have_problem, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.education_info where employee_name = #{employeeName}
